title._content: [Unidentified girl and boy, probably siblings, in ring] (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified girl and boy, probably siblings, in ring] [between 1860 and 1870] 1 photograph : tintype, hand-colored ; 3.5 x 3.2 cm (ring) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Ring made of bone or bone-like material. Inscribed on ring: ELFER [?]. Gift; Tom Liljenquist; 2010; (DLC/PP-2010:105). Subjects: Children--1860-1870. Families--1860-1870. Format: Group portraits--1860-1870. Rings--1860-1870. Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Tintypes--Hand-colored--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Persistent URL: hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.27480 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 2606
